definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: wrong-doing, guiltiness (properly Inf. cf. [[אַהֲבָה]], [[יִרְאָה]])—´[[א]] Le 22:16 + 5 t., cstr. [[אַשְׁמַת]] Ezr 10:10 + 3 t.; sf. [[אַשְׁמָתוֹ]] Le 5:24 + 6 t.; pl. [[אֲשָׁמוֹת]] 2Ch 28:10; sf. [[אַשְׁמוֹתַי]] Ps 69:6; —

doing wrong, committing a trespass or offence 2Ch 24:18, 2Ch 28:10, 2Ch 28:13, 2Ch 28:13, 2Ch 28:13 (‖[[חטאת]] v:2Ch 28:13) 2Ch 32:23, Ezr 9:6, Ezr 9:7, Ezr 9:13, Ezr 9:15 (‖[[עָוֹן]] v:Ezr 9:13) Ps 69:6 (‖[[אִוֶּלָת]]); [[מִכּׂל אֲשֶׁר יַעֲשֶׂה]] [[לְאַשְׁמָה בָהּ]] of all that one may do wrong therein Le 6:6 (P; ‖[[לַחֲטׂא בָהֵנׇּה]] v:Le 6:3).

becoming guilty 1Ch 21:3, Ezr 10:10, Ezr 10:19; [[יֶחֱטָא לְאַשְׁמַת הָעָם]] sin to the becoming guilty of the people (so that the people incur guilt) Le 4:3; [[אַשְׁמַת שׁׂמְרוֹן]] guilt of Samaria (their idols) Am 8:14.
bringing a trespass-offering, [[בְּיוֹם אַשְׁמָתוֹ]] in the day of his bringing his trespass-offering Le 5:24; [[עֲוֹן אַשְׁמָה]] iniquity requiring a trespass-offering Le 22:16.
